Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: Moises De Lima
Reviews.Content: Excelent the best if you dont like iphone.. 100% recommended. ... excelente.. muy recomendado si no quieres ser un esclavo de las acualizaciones del iphone

Reviews.Title: Great All Around
Reviews.Author: Goldibug
Reviews.Content: The phone works smoothly and quickly with everything I've tried on it.  The photos are crisp and bright, apps have no problems with lagging, calls are clear and crisp...I have zero complaints on the quality of this phone.  I'm using it all the time and the battery only needs to be charged once a day!  I recommend this phone to anyone looking for a new smart phone.  Samsung knows their stuff.

Reviews.Title: great!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey Boutin
Reviews.Content: Excellent quality! works fast and great! Started with some settings in another language. But there's nothing to complain about really. The phone is in perfect working order.

Reviews.Title: 6 months and no issues!
Reviews.Author: DrPixel
Reviews.Content: I love this phone and if the same seller gets the Samsung Galaxy S5 in April, I will be buying it from them. If you have an iPhone, I feel so sorry for you as this is the phone to have, bar none!

Reviews.Title: Doesn't Support 4G LTE in USA
Reviews.Author: Khaled
Reviews.Content: It says it supports 4g LTE but it only supports HSPA+ band on Tmobile USA and AT&T;No point to buy the latest phone from Samsung without being able to enjoy the 4g LTE

Reviews.Title: Bad battery..
Reviews.Author: Jayanta Paul
Reviews.Content: Bad battery life it damage within 4 months. Then i buy a new battery.Battery was made in china..i think they change the battery before sell. The package was not intake.

Reviews.Title: Works very well.
Reviews.Author: m51chris
Reviews.Content: Does everything I need.  Is light, solid. Fits nicely in my hand. Battery lasts a long time. needs a good instruction manual.

Reviews.Title: best phone in the world!
Reviews.Author: devante franklin
Reviews.Content: This phone is amazing! I had the GS3 before and mostbof the features you had to find butnthis one shows you and they all work great. The eye scroll on websites gets annoying when your reading something and look down slightly but ive come to get used to it. Amazing screen and very responsive. I had actually but the international version of the galaxy s3 and it turned out to be a fake. So I'm very happy that this one was the International but it was real. You can tell by the screen. Its not AMOLED screen then its a fake. Love this phone bump iPhone get this one!

OS Android OS, v4.2.2 (Jelly Bean)
Chipset Qualcomm APQ8064T Snapdragon 600
CPU 	Quad-core 1.9 GHz Krait 300, GPU Adreno 320
Sensors Accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer, temperature, humidity, gesture
Messaging 	SMS(threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Mail, IM, RSS
ProductInfo.Name: Mobile Phone Samsung Galaxy S4 I9505 Black
